hero.name: Miguel Fernández Gargurevich
hero.title: Cloud Solutions Architect & Full-Stack Developer
hero.subtitle: Specialized in Azure cloud infrastructure, AI integration, and modern web applications

about.title: About Me
about.description: Passionate cloud solutions architect with expertise in Azure, AI/ML, and full-stack development. I help businesses transform their digital infrastructure and build scalable, intelligent applications.
about.roleDescription1: As a passionate cloud solutions architect, I specialize in designing and implementing scalable, secure, and cost-effective cloud infrastructures using Microsoft Azure.
about.roleDescription2: My expertise spans across cloud migration strategies, DevOps practices, and AI/ML integration, helping businesses transform their digital infrastructure and accelerate their innovation journey.
about.roleDescription3: I believe in the power of modern technologies to solve complex business challenges, and I'm constantly exploring new tools and methodologies to deliver exceptional results.
